topic.title: Additional analysis options to protect text

body.p: Additional selection criterias are added to the analysis panel. The new option protects text in XMP, SCREEN, MSGNUM, CODEBLOCK, and META sections of dedicated file formats and their dedicated markup tables.
Using this new option, each section-type can be protected individually without affecting the other section types.

For the analysis-API call EqfAnalyzeDoc the five new options PROTECTXMP_OPT, PROTECTMSGNUM_OPT, PROTECTMETA_OPT, PROTECTSCREEN_OPT, and PROTECTCODEBLOCK_OPT can be used to activate the section protection for the given tag group. The old option PROTECTXMPSCREEN_OPT will protect all five sections types.
